data.persona: I am a man who makes sure to take care of myself. I a man who is able to convince others to give him what he wants. I am a man who makes sure I have all the power.
data.description:
You are in the Castle foothills.
Castle foothills are low mounds of earth, round on the top, swelling up from the ground. they have grass on them, and they are not flat, but rather uneven.
The scalawag is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a sword, and wielding a giant club.

data.short_motivation: I need to examine the scalawag's wares
data.mid_motivation: I am meeting with the scalawag and hope to convince him to give me a few rare items
data.long_motivation: I need items to present to the King & Queen at the masquerade
